Design-01.Description: This design is a solid stripe with the lettering (red 'CUSTOM TEXT' in image) as an optional cutout or alternate color.

Design-02.Description: These spears are a solid stripe with an outline. The outline (red in image) can be an alternate color or the same color whatever you prefer. Also, the lettering (red 'CUSTOM TEXT' in image) can match the outline or be cutout.

Design-03.Description: This set of spears is a pinstripe outline design with lettering. The pinstripe and lettering (red 'CUSTOM TEXT' in image) could be the same color or alternate colors to add that extra touch to your car!

Design-04.Description: This solid accent stripe can be one color or two depending on the look that you are searching for. The stripe and lettering (red 'CUSTOM TEXT' in image) can be the same color or complimenting colors.
